attributes.action: Include a selection for a vote of no confidence in all local and national elections
attributes.additional_details:
Over the years we have seen ministers from all parties working against the best interest of the British public.

The current out dated system no longer works and leaves no option for the public who do not beleive in any policy or party.

My aim with this petition is to give power back to the British public to Vote for the party of their choice or vote "no confidence" of any political party or candidates.

In the event of a no cofidence vote, policy can be put in place where power is handed to a neutral party such as the Monarch and no laws, or legislation can be passed until such a time that the British public are satisfied that a party recognises that they serve the public and are not being served by the public. regular elections could be carried out at 6 month intervals until a solution is found and a party chosen by the public.
